description: It is Valentine`s day, and the boys in Jadoo`s class tries to be nice to the girls to earn some chocolate. Jadoo is envious of Minji, who has three older brothers. But Minji is envious of Jadoo who has a little brother and a sister. Somehow their souls are exchanged, and they experience each others` lives.

titles.title: 발렌타인 초콜릿은 누구에게 / 나도 오빠가 있었으면 좋겠다
